name: Gradient-Boosted Decision Tree
description: A gradient-boosted decision tree is, as in other bagging and boosting methods, a method where the relatively 'weak' machine learning model (a decision tree) is used in an ensemble to form a 'strong' machine learning model.
x_kb_article:
## Reference

1. Google. (28 Sep 2023). Gradient Boosted Decision Trees.
[Link](https://developers.google.com/machine-learning/decision-forests/intro-to-gbdt).
